tvmega_recap: Ramona kisses Ben in her hotel room. Ben is taken aback thinking that sex isn't part of the package. He tells Ramona this and she tells him that Eden pays him to be an escort and if he delivers good full service, she will also pay him. Wednesdays are good for her, about him. He says that he will think about it. Alan and Alex spar. Olivia kisses Phillip and they talk about Alan setting her up. Alan is eavesdropping at the door and hears their conversation. He takes some of his pills and Alex finds him later passed out on the couch. Phillip takes Olivia out to dinner after having an argument with Alan. Gus and Eden talk about family. She gives him a name and address that may help.
